__e: Sara Collins has been missing for almost two weeks, and I still don't know why she was grabbed.
Collins needs me at the house.
Collins flew over Area One on his way to Area Two. Does he always fly that?
He thinks Collins is after him, too.
Mr. Collins came here expressly to propose marriage to one of my daughters!
It never happened for Mr. Collins and myself.
I know that, Mr. Collins, and I want to help you.
Why not? Because I remember him when I was in training. He and Collins were doing really important work.
I understand Mr Collins has made you an offer of marriage.
Where Mrs. Collins told you the boy was not her son.
Collins was alive when his feet were cut off?
They told me that David Collins died a week ago.
